attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do you feel enough is enough.. Are we just paying extra tax / duty, because we are an easy target???.. Do you not think it is time to act and get the cost of running a car back down to what is an acceptable living expenditure.. If so please sign my petition & help get fuel duty car tax back to was is recognized as normal..

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
